problem_text_cn: 如图,已知直线a∥b∥c,分别交直线m、n于点A、C、E、B、D、F,AC=4,CE=6,BD=3,则BF的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the known straight line a ∥ b ∥ c, intersecting the straight line n at points A, C, E, B, D, F, AC = N_0, CE = N_1, BD = N_2, then the length of BF is ()
raw_comment: 此题考查了平行线分线段成比例定理．题目比较简单,解题的关键是注意数形结合思想的应用．
